actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: As this scene suggests, their trip to Keeney is cut short by a couple of evil PROBLEM SETS surrounding our heroes.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: Now normally, pieces of paper don't move on their own.
(TIP: Use the left-click and right-click to trigger the Perkinites' special abilities. Use these to attack the enemies and maintain your lives!)
(TIP: Abilities will have cooldowns after activation, meaning that they cannot be activated until the cooldown is over. Most cooldowns are short, but take note of this!)
